thread.title: WATCH: McLaren reveal the MCL32 | F1 News
thread.title_full: WATCH: McLaren reveal the MCL32 | F1 News

title: WATCH: McLaren reveal the MCL32 | F1 News
text:
WATCH: McLaren reveal the MCL32 Launch now being streamed on Sky Sports - tune in! Last Updated: 24/02/17 11:10am Tune in now for the launch of the MCL32 McLaren are unveiling their 2017 car in a launch that is being broadcast live on Sky Sports, with as much interest on the colour of the car as the design. 
In arguably the most eagerly-anticipated reveal of this year's 'car launch season', all eyes were on the livery of the MCL32 when the car was launched with the team reverting to a dramatic orange and black look. 
The launch is being broadcast live on Sky Sports News HQ, across the Sky Sports F1 Digital platforms. WOW! McLaren unveil new orange, black and white livery for 2017 https://t.co/hNLG32yEM5 pic.twitter.com/e8BxtgLH77 — Sky Sports F1 đ (@SkySportsF1) February 24, 2017 
The launch will also be streamed live on McLaren's YouTube page. 
The first pre-season test of the winter starts on Monday at Barcelona.
